title: living beings
descript: material set of complex organization, in which molecular communication systems intervene that relate it internally and with the environment in an exchange

title: herbivorous beings
descript: They are those whose diet is mainly vegetal, so they consume plants, herbs or algae.

title: carnivorous beings
descript: It is one that subsists on a meat-only diet, its ability to use other kinds of resources being marginal.

title: omnivorous beings
descript: are those that feed on both animals and plants
